tosdr.case: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
quoteText: The Web Site may contain links to third party Web Sites that are not owned or controlled by MetaCafe. MetaCafe is not affiliated with those websites, has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party Web Sites.
